sentences.en: ...proposals for a legally binding commitment on nations to stabilize emissions of carbon dioxide.
sentences.cn: …关于就稳定二氧化碳排放各国做出有法律约束力的承诺的建议。

sentences.en: Both sides have agreed that the arbitration will be binding.
sentences.cn: 双方都赞同仲裁具有约束力.

sentences.en: Consequently, they are binding on both the agency and the private party.
sentences.cn: 所以, 宣告性裁决对行政机关和私人当事人均有约束力.

sentences.en: Electronic charge that is binding is located in the region.
sentences.cn: 起成健作用的电子电荷定城在此区域.

sentences.en: He is binding a new book.
Myoglobin is a red, oxygen - binding protein found in muscles.
sentences.cn: 肌红蛋白是存在于肌肉中的红色的随氧蛋白.

sentences.en: She had believed it was all legal and binding enough.
sentences.cn: 她一直以为他们的婚姻是完全合法和有约束力的.

sentences.en: She hurriedly untied the ropes binding her ankles.
sentences.cn: 她连忙解开绑着脚踝的绳子。

sentences.en: Short for binder utility, an operating - system program that performs binding.
sentences.cn: 联编实用程序的简称, 是一种能够实现联接和编辑的操作系统 级 的程序.

sentences.en: Some foods bind the bowels / are binding , ie cause constipation.
sentences.cn: 有些食物容易引起便秘.

sentences.en: The agreement will be legally binding.
sentences.cn: 这个协议将具有法律效力.

sentences.en: The arbitration decision shall be final and binding on both parties.
sentences.cn: 仲裁裁决是最终的,对双方均有约束.

sentences.en: The binding energy of the deuteron can be found experimentally.
sentences.cn: 可以实验测定氘的结合能.

sentences.en: The binding is sober and solid.
This drug lowers cholesterol levels by binding fats in the intestine.
sentences.cn: 这种药通过黏合肠内的脂肪降低胆固醇水平。

sentences.en: This regulation is binding on everybody.

trans.tran_en: a promise, agreement etc that must be obeyed

trans.tran_cn: 捆绑，（衣服等的）镶边，粘合剂，书籍的封面
